import perfil from './imagens/perfil.jpg'; import perfil2 from './imagens/perfil2.jpg'; import perfil3 from './imagens/perfil3.jpg'; import perfil4 from './imagens/perfil4.jpg'; import perfil5 from './imagens/perfil5.jpg'; function Perfil() { const storiesRef = useRef(null) const [showleft, setShowleft] = useState(false) const [showright, setShowright] = useState(true) const onScroll = () => { if ( storiesRef.current.scrollLeft === storiesRef.current.scrollWidth - storiesRef.current.clientWidth ) { setShowright(false) } else { setShowright(true) } if (storiesRef.current.scrollLeft > 0) { setShowleft(true) } else { setShowleft(false) } } return ( <>
